property.name: Rules
property.value: Play only if you made a successful run on R&D, HQ, and Archives this turn. Access 1 installed card (non-ice).

property.name: Flavor
property.value: That moment of bliss. That feeling of accomplishment. That certainty of purpose. What's next?

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you make a successful run, place 1 virus counter on Hemorrhage. [Click], 2 hosted virus counters: The Corp trashes 1 card from HQ.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Bleeding data is more of a science than an art. Too much and you can end up with a one-way ticket to flatline city. Not enough and you might as well be running an empty server.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a gray ops or black ops operation is trashed after resolving, you may give the Corp 1 bad publicity and take 1 tag. [Trash]: Draw 1 card for each bad publicity the Corp has.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Stick with your plan and you'll be fine. Stick with the plan.

property.name: Instructions
property.value: (Only after Black Ops or Grey Ops Resolves) Give 1 Bad Publicity and Take 1 Tag||[Trash]: Draw 1 card for each bad publicity the Corp has.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to play this event, spend [Click]. Reveal all cards in HQ.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When you need someone who is a little more hands, look me up." -Silhouette

property.name: Rules
property.value: +2[Memory Unit] Whenever you expose a card, the Corp must rez it by paying its rez cost, if able. Limit 1 console per player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The power of the focused mind is a power beyond comprehension.

property.name: Rules
property.value: +2[Memory Unit]

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "CyberSolutions is a boring name for a company that makes pretty exciting products. Their memory chips have some pretty tricky stuff going on inside and I keep hearing good things about their M/MI implants. I even heard they were on the path to their own androids about a year ago. I wonder whatever happened with that?" -Kate "Mac" McCaffrey

property.name: Rules
property.value: 1[Credits]: Break ice subroutine. 1[Credits]: +1 strength. Use Alpha only on the outermost piece of ice protecting a server.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The beginning...

property.name: Instructions
property.value: 1 [Credits]: Break ICE subroutine.||1 [Credits]: +1 strength.

property.name: Rules
property.value: 1[Credits]: Break ice subroutine. 1[Credits]: +1 strength. USe Omega only on the innermost piece of ice protecting a server.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: ...and the end?

property.name: Instructions
property.value: 1 [Credits]: Break ICE subroutine.||1 [Credits]: +1 strength.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Play only if the Corp has at least 1 bad publicity. Make a run. The Corp cannot rez ice for the duration of this run.

property.name: Rules
property.value:
As an additional cost to play this operation, spend [Click].
Gain 5[Credits] and draw 2 cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Blue-one level clearance doesn't exist. And if it did exist, you wouldn't be cleared to know about it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each time the Runner accesses an agenda from this server, he or she must spend [Click] as an additional cost in order to steal it. This applies even during the run on which the Runner trashes Strongbox.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Toshiyuki Sakai can be advanced. If Toshiyuki Sakai is accessed while installed, you may swap him with an agenda or asset from HQ. The new agenda or asset is installed unrezzed, and keeps all advancement tokens on Toshiyuki Sakai. The Runner can choose not to access the new card.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Code Gate-AP

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Subroutine] Look at the top card of R&D. You may add that card to the bottom of R&D. [Subroutine] Do 1 net damage.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The 'cyber-war' is a war of information, and in a war of information, advance warning can be as good as a killing blow. -Michael Muhama, Musings on Cybercrime

property.name: Instructions
property.value: [Subroutine] Look at the top card of R&D. You may add that card to the bottom of R&D||[Subroutine] Inflict 1 net damage

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trash one of your installed sysops, executives, or clones. If you do, remove up to 2 bad publicity.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He slowly pried open the lid, and the tantō glinted madly in the half-light. The executive motioned to the blade. Looks like the meeting was being cut short.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If the Runner is tagged when you score Market Research, place 1 agenda counter on it. Market Research is worth 1 additional agenda point while it has an agenda counter on it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If there is no installed fracter, Wraparound has +7 strength. [Subroutine] End the run.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It can make a real fine roller coaster, provided you're properly stimmed up." -Noise

property.name: Subtitle
property.value: Power Unleashed

property.name: Rules
property.value: You start the game with 10[Credits] and 1 bad publicity.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Geostrategic Research and Neothermal Development Laboratories

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Weyland Consortium

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you score Vulcan Coverup, do 2 meat damage. When the Runner steals Vulcan Coverup, take 1 bad pûblicity.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I did warn you that leaks would have to be patched."

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Weyland Consortium

property.name: Rules
property.value: GRNDL Refinery can be advanced. [Click], [Trash]: Gain 4[Credits] for each advancement token on GRNDL Refinery.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: GRNDL refineries process many different rare elements unearthed during the fracking process.

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Weyland Consortium

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Gray Ops

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gain 1[Credits]. Gain [Click] if you have not played another Subliminal Messaging this turn. If the Runner did not make a run during his or her last turn, you may add Subliminal Messaging to HQ from Archives when your turn begins.
